Title: Going Once, Going Twice
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Davey Holmes, Dominique Morisseau (story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona confronts Patrick about the eviction notice, but her only choice is to get a mortgage from the bank and bid on the house at auction. Ian bakes cookies for the firehouse and discovers he was saved by the shift of gay firemen.
